readable.title: 3482062809_3b694322c4
readable.content: A group of tourists stand around as a lady puts her hand near the mouth of a statue . A woman is making a statue pretend to kiss her hand beside four boys at a bench . A woman posing with a statue alongside a group of boys A woman with a backpack leans again a statue while a group of boys sit on a bench talking . Woman gets her hand kissed by living statue street artist .
